General.Name: DMS Co.Ltd
General.Industry: Machinery, Tools, Heavy Vehicles, Trains & Ships
General.Description: DMS Co.,Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of FPD and renewable energy equipment in South Korea and internationally. The company produces and supplies LCD/OLED equipment, such as depo, initial, HF, and photo cleaners; developer machines; wet etchers and strippers; and PI coaters. It also provides photovoltaic and wind power generation systems. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Yongin, South Korea.
